website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, colonial-style light post that won't rust or wobble on its post.
pros: Puts out a lot of light
Sits sturdily on top of most light posts
cons: Some people have said that the light was smaller than they expected

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: excellent deal for the price. sturdy enough and easy to wire. slide right onto my 3" dia post. nice black metal that should hold up to the weather. light base does extend fairly high so standard bulb will almost come to the top of the open sides. I just used a smaller light bulb. It is also a tad smaller in height and width than I wanted but for the price it works and looks just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ibnelly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought a home that had these light posts around our pool. One of them broke last week so I ordered a replacement. I am so happy with how quick/easy it was to install. All of the others are looking pretty bad, so I am about to order 6 more. They aren’t the greatest quality, HOWEVER, for the price you can’t beat these. Even if they only last a few years, we are happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor lights
customer_reviews.text: We purchased multiple of these lights to put on the posts on our deck. They are a great quality light and they look very nice. They are simple but yet really add to the appearance of our deck. They aren't super bright, but actually they give off the perfect amount of light for the deck. Overall, a great quality light.
customer_reviews.author: Mosterhaus

customer_reviews.title: Nice light post.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp post was delivered quickly and is of very good quality. It was a little smaller then I though it would be but the design is pretty and the finish is a type of metal which I am happy about. At this great price I will order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Perea

customer_reviews.title: these are a good value. Keep in mind the size of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 to put at the entrance to our subdivision. They fit perfectly and shine brightly. They are plastic and clear glass but for the price, these are a good value. Keep in mind the size of this unit also. They were smaller that I expected but that is no fault of the product. Just remember that the 15" includes the tip of the stem.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G

customer_reviews.title: The mount is tapered so it would not fit over an existing 3" diameter pole easily. The pole had to be modified to accommodate ..
customer_reviews.text: As many reviews stated it's smaller than expected. The mount is tapered so it would not fit over an existing 3" diameter pole easily. The pole had to be modified to accommodate the light.
customer_reviews.author: jay c

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The light fit the existing pole and had plenty of wire length to make connections. Quality was better than expected so very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gelrod

customer_reviews.title: Puny size
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace a fixture that took one too many hits from a soccer ball. It fit on the pole and connected to the existing wiring very easily. My complaint is it is very puny looking on top of a 5 foot lamp post. I will use it at least until the lamp post is no longer used as a goal post because it is relatively inexpensive fixture but I will be replacing it with with something more prominent in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lance E Deaver

customer_reviews.title: Sunlite ODI1160 15-Inch Decorative Light Post Outdoor Fixture, White Finish with Clear Glass
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good light fixture for the price and it looks very nice in stalled on my brick post.
customer_reviews.author: wayne c snowden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for a well made product
customer_reviews.text: . We use these for the tops of the columns in the patio walls. A great way to save money and hook it up using a low voltage transformer is to purchase 12volt A-19 or E26 off grid LED bulbs. They are the same size as regular bulbs, come in warm and bright white and use a lot less energy. Amazon has them for sale also for the best price I have found anywhere
customer_reviews.author: GinaBrown

customer_reviews.title: It Works !!!
customer_reviews.text: This gets 5 stars on price.......other reviewers are correct in there assessment of quality......but the comments on "small" is def a personal issue. I had one of these on my front yard pole for the past 30 yrs, and the plastic held up all this time...and it still works !!!! The pole totally rusted out , so it will now be replaced with aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price Sunlite ODI1160
customer_reviews.text: The Sunlite ODI1160 15on Deco Light . Arrived fast I replaced the old one with this one , I added some clear silicone to fix the issues from the old fixture installed a new CFL Light done with it .
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: I am going to spray paint both to match my originals but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over 6 months now and was hoping to order a few more. They are both working but one discolored after about 4 months and the second a month later. They have turned from black to light gray. I live in Irving, Texas and they have been exposed to the sun, rain, & a temperature range from the 40s to the 90s. I am going to spray paint both to match my originals but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chapas

customer_reviews.title: Sorta Okay But Not Really Happy
customer_reviews.text: Two of the glass panels were lightly chipped on the bottom edge, leaving some glass shards inside upon arrival. The unit fit okay on the light pole, but the base started to slightly fracture from using a standard, non-electric screwdriver to tighten the bolts. It's solid enough to last until I can buy a better post lamp locally, but I wouldn't order another one of these. So, it's okay, but will get replaced later on.
customer_reviews.author: kdddavswife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for The Villages
customer_reviews.text: The light on my home in The Villages failed and the socket fell apart. This wired right in and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Lasted four years
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted almost four years. Water got inside and rusted out the socket where you put in the bulb. For the price, it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: BSU Brian

customer_reviews.title: Quality appears to be good, will see how this one holds up
customer_reviews.text: Had similar light fixture that got broken. Couldn't find a replacement at big box store where original was purchased. Quality appears to be good, will see how this one holds up.
customer_reviews.author: mdh55

customer_reviews.title: Front Yard
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect replacement for my broken front yard light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: works great. yes its not heavy and max durability but it works and looks great and just dont wrench it down and it wont crack for the price it’s fantastic looks gr8
customer_reviews.author: KNC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very small
customer_reviews.text: Looks so small on top of the post! I wish I would’ve went bigger! It’s installed but looks too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Purchased it and then re-painted it with a high-quality paint so hopefully it should last for years to
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is a cheap inexpensive light fixture for a light pole. I Purchased it and then re-painted it with a high-quality paint so hopefully it should last for years to
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Z.

customer_reviews.title: Like these for the price but there are the odd ...
customer_reviews.text: Like these for the price but there are the odd little quirks that suggest you're getting what you pay for. Screws used were a pain to use to be honest. Grooves were filled with paint so get the screwdriver head to be seated & turn the screw was difficult. Overall, brilliant for my application & I plan on tinting/ frosting the (real) glass panes to diffuse the light. Used pretty bright led bulbs so now want a glow vs a spot light
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy install
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery about ordering these based on a previous review. I'm hoping the previous review brought about changes because the two lamps I ordered are fantastic. The glass is beveled to give a nicer look. The lamp was easy to disassemble to place the bulb. Total install time was 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbobamatic

customer_reviews.title: but adds a nice feel to my yard decorations
customer_reviews.text: This is used for a Christmas decoration lamppost. not the most ornate looking, but adds a nice feel to my yard decorations.
customer_reviews.author: I smell of elderberry

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps but only one works.
customer_reviews.text: The lanterns look good but one works and one doesn’t so I had to order a new one. Hope it works
customer_reviews.author: Terri Rathfon

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Went together well. And seams to be built with materials which will hold up well (except for maybe the screws). We live close to the ocean and most the lights we have used only last a few years. Hope this one will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Classy look for my guard wall. Unfortunately, the color cannot stand up to the Caribbean sun. Should be sold with the base though.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good value. And i found it.
customer_reviews.author: A Sheets

customer_reviews.title: works and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then thought when ordering but fits post, works and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: J Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Seems small when mounted on a post.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace one of the pressure mount screws with a self taping screw into the post. nice light but seems small for mounting on a post.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bird

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for......
customer_reviews.text: Put a bulb in this tiny thing, and it ends up half under the top hood/cover. LOL. However, for what I paid for it, it was "fine". I actually went to home depot and bought what I needed, but installed this silly cheap thing in the backyard for extra lighting.
customer_reviews.author: ROLF817

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then you think.
customer_reviews.text: It is small on the post it looks very small in size. They should take a photo with it on a post and you could see that. The screws to hold down the top are to hard to screw on and off. I thought it was going to break the screw.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Day

customer_reviews.title: It looks great out front and there is no visible wear/damage after ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the quality is incredible. I expected it to turn to junk not long after being installed since I went so cheap. It looks great out front and there is no visible wear/damage after extreme Illinois weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Landuyt

customer_reviews.title: Screws too short
customer_reviews.text: Top screws are to short to screw. They are double sided and if you try to screw the bolts first, then the screw will be too short to screw to base. I should have checked before installing and growing away the box.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: ... old light post with this one and it works great. I only wish that the glass panels were ...
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old light post with this one and it works great. I only wish that the glass panels were more snug so that bugs would not be able to fly inside and die, leaving a mess on the inside. But i guess this is the case with most exterior lights anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Allen L.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Glass, but I hope gets replace
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, except came with a broken glass, If I get a replacement glass, I will have no complaint.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: ANYONE CAN DO THIS.....
customer_reviews.text: MY LAMP POST LIGHT WAS ORDERED 2 DAYS AGO, AND WAS DELIVERED TODAY 8/9/18, AND ALL BUT 10 MIN WORK , WAS INSTALLED ON MY POLE LIGHT.... I AM HAPPY WITH THE QUALITY AND DESIGN.....
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: so that's a nice touch I didn't expect
customer_reviews.text: What you are buying here is an inexpensive post topper light, and this is exactly that. Nothing more, nothing less. Slightly smaller than I expected. The glass is actually beveled, so that's a nice touch I didn't expect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good, Price
customer_reviews.text: Quality: Good, Price: Excellent Convenience: Good. I use it for exterior decoration and looks good. When I look at it my reaccion is: "I pay only a fraction of it would it cost me in a regular store". Thank you amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Caballo

customer_reviews.title: Good post light for areas plagued by the unruly
customer_reviews.text: Petite exterior lights, very bright with compact florescent bulb. Liked the low price, as I use them in a pole light by a road that is vulnerable to truant kids and playful drunks.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor lights
customer_reviews.text: These are not high quality lights, but they are working well for me. I have put them in (3) and they have lasted fine outdoors for the last year. No fading or paint chipping. For the price, you can't beat these outdoor lights.
customer_reviews.author: RW Monterey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This light looks a little small compared to the one that was on our post. It is made out of metal and feels like it's substantial. Just a piece of advice. Don't over tighten the screws or the pain around the screw will start to crack. That's my fault, not necessarily the product. Overall, I am very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tom. P

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but fully functional
customer_reviews.text: For the cost this light fixture is a good value. It looks exactly like the powered coated aluminum fixture it is replacing except the coating on this one is plastic. I expect it to perform well in the weather. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jim b

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. I purchased this one to replace a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. I purchased this one to replace a different one I purchased from Amazon that the glass on one side was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Shartman

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small light fixture purchased to replace a much bigger one. It was easy to install and very little assembly. Looks good, works well and service it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: KS Senior

customer_reviews.title: This little post light severed my purpose as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: This little post light severed my purpose as well as could be expected! I don't expect it to last as long as a higher priced one would but that is not a problem for me!
customer_reviews.author: William J Weber

customer_reviews.title: Looks too small for a large lawn entry.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with a dusk to dawn led bulb. A bit small in scale for a 3" post. (Duh, I didn't pay attention to the tech data!)
customer_reviews.author: James L. Mcarthur

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Returned item because it was too small. Needed a larger light
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Solid, not plastic coated, it's painted and better then the ones sold at HD!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was a replacement for one that broke and originally purchased from HD. It was better made with better base screws and was NOT PLASTIC Coated but painted. It's solid!
customer_reviews.author: Ted from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Broken and Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these lights. Both came with broken glass. Also, the description says "100-W Max" capable, however the sticker on the lights said "60-W Max". Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: LDMKRDY

customer_reviews.title: Post Light
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive light post. You get what you paid for on this one. Do not expect more. It is made of glass and a very light metal but it was an upgrade from the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Its so small I can't see it.
customer_reviews.text: Its much smaller than the one I had before, but its of pretty good quality. Its better as a mounted wall light than a stand alone post light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a nice outdoor fixture at a great price. easy to install on old lamp post. a shining light!!
customer_reviews.author: gordo

customer_reviews.title: Light cwas delivered incomplete
customer_reviews.text: One of the lights came without parts and the inner bag was tied in a knot. I think it was opened before and possibly returned.
customer_reviews.author: c. n. white

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Put about 4 coats of spray polyurethane ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Put about 4 coats of spray polyurethane on all four and expect them to be there for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerR Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great product and wonderful shipping personnel!
customer_reviews.text: I received both items packaged so well! I want to say Thank You for both shipping an a wonderful product, I will order a 3rd light for our RV Park light!
customer_reviews.author: SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Good post head for a good price, cant go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.text: It is what it was supposed to be and has been working great for months now, way cheaper than buying at the local home supply stores!
customer_reviews.author: No Deal

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: FITS PERFECTLY... VERY STURDY... PRICE IS VERY REASONABLE... I WOULDN'T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT IT LEAKING DO TO THE TOP WEARING OUT...
customer_reviews.author: T. Pettis

customer_reviews.title: Okay pole light
customer_reviews.text: Okay pole light for the money. Don't like the top and they way it screws on. I know at some point I will loose a screw cap changing the blub.
customer_reviews.author: W. Randall

customer_reviews.title: lights are great, dont mind the negative talk
customer_reviews.text: lights are great,dont mind the negative talk,be gentle with them
customer_reviews.author: baddogg

customer_reviews.title: good deal good product
customer_reviews.text: Good deal and good product! was what I was looking for and for what I needed. better price than at the local home improvement store.
customer_reviews.author: samuel j hartsell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: True, The light is a little small. But it was only 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: angel
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for what I needed for.Works just find and it was easy too install on my lamp post.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: I was most pleased with the expedient delivery of this product. They fit well with the pier lamp mounts that I had ordered and they added to a wonderful outside décor. I was pleasantly surprised to received metal fixtures as I felt sure the items I had purchased was plastic which made me quite disillusioned. When mounting do not over tighten the fixture as the metal is somewhat and will crack. I discovered this on the first fixture that I mounted. After my initial discovery, everything mounted like clock work,
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Houston

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. If you have a good size post as I do, this looks cheap - and is a very tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great Post Light
customer_reviews.text: Just what I hoped for, will be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck in Port Richey, Fl

customer_reviews.title: lamp post top
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit smaller than I thought, but it will do the job. Quality is just OK nothing special, installation was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary O

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I expected, but the dimensions are stated.
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Quality light for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Simple light, decent quality. Exactly what I was looking for based on price.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Nixie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Working at exceptions. I like it, worth for the price i paid. Let us see how long it will go.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect replacement., for the one that was broken.
customer_reviews.author: vi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible light post cap
customer_reviews.text: Terrible light post cap. It is tiny. The tin thread in the socket came out on me. Used contact cement and solder to hold it in. Glass panels were chipped and lose in the package. All glass holders on the light was straight and needed to be bent to hold the panels in place. This is garbage, Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great, fast shipping. Product as described with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Smoke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product exactly according to my need size is perfect and the price is right.I love it awesome deal.
customer_reviews.author: ISAAC ARTHUR CALEB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although constructed of good solid material the post light itself was smaller than I had originally expected.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition at driveway entrance
customer_reviews.text: Product met expectations. Excellent addition at driveway entrance. Provides good ambiance after dark.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice L Curd

customer_reviews.title: Sunlite OD1160
customer_reviews.text: The Sunlite was great and just what I needed. The price was right and white is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: PAULINE CASTILLOUX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product I will get it for my next project definitely!
customer_reviews.author: roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The light is not as big as I thought. But it works good and worht the money spent. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Java Certified

customer_reviews.title: really like this light
customer_reviews.text: really like this light ! it is brighter than I thought it would be and it was easy for my husband to put up on our post
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hudson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to install With a little shaving of my post
customer_reviews.author: Robert Russell

customer_reviews.title: Sunlite
customer_reviews.text: the light base was only 4' and a 1/2,shows much bigger in picture,it says 15',no where near that,so I guess I will eat it. the look in the picture is so much off. Howard Searolaski
customer_reviews.author: Dean

product_meta.title: Sunlite ODI1150 15-Inch Decorative Light Post Outdoor Fixture, Black Finish with Clear Glass
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:Old ModelFROM THE MANUFACTURER
With its timeless colonial profile, light post outdoor fixture is perfect for those looking to embellish classic sophistication. It is made from cast aluminum so this 1-light light post can go with any home decor while being able to withstand the elements. It features a Black finish with clear beveled glass panels. This wall lantern uses a 100-watt (max.) bulb, measures 5.9-Inch wide by 14.95-Inch high, and is U.L. listed for wet locations.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars250 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
